ISSUE.TITLE: add full support for elastic hq
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Elastic HQ Plugin: http://www.elastichq.org/support_plugin.html works good. But some variables like CPU and Network.. are not correct / elassandra provide no information here. elasticsearch does.
